tool_description: Official Postal Ninja tracking API for developers
name: Postal Ninja
title: Postal Ninja

api_list.name: listCarriers
api_list.description: Returns list of all supported carriers.

api_list.name: listTracks
api_list.description: Lists all or selected packages with pagination.

required_parameters.name: events
required_parameters.description: Include or not events info for each selected package

required_parameters.name: lang
required_parameters.description: Language to translate event descriptions and locations to: AS_IS - no translation at all, EN - use only stored translations to English, EN_MT - use machine translation by Google if there is no stored translation for this term, etc.

optional_parameters.name: trackCodes
optional_parameters.description: Return packages only with tracking numbers from given comma-separated list

optional_parameters.name: ids
optional_parameters.description: Return packages only with IDs from given comma-separated list

optional_parameters.name: list
optional_parameters.description: Select packages only from given list. Or any - if not specified

api_list.name: ping
api_list.description: Returns OK for authorized API user
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://postal-ninja.p.rapidapi.com/v1/ping"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "postal-ninja.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://postal-ninja.p.rapidapi.com/v1/ping"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "postal-ninja.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: getTrack
api_list.description: Returns tracking info for given package ID.

required_parameters.name: await
required_parameters.description: If true - await previously submitted refresh request to complete, if false - don't wait and return package info immediately

required_parameters.name: lang
required_parameters.description: Language to translate event descriptions and locations to: AS_IS - no translation at all, EN - use only stored translations to English, EN_MT - use machine translation by Google if there is no stored translation for this term, etc.
